title: Suggestion
body:
Was wondering wouldn't it be so much more convenient and efficient to add a skin counter in the LOL Client, you know something that tell's you how many skins you have and perhaps a section exclusively made for the skins you own. I know some people might say go to the store and click on owned skins but that doesn't show you all the skins some aren't in store anymore so you won't get the full list and it doesn't tell you how many you got.

So in conclusion my suggestion is a list of skins you own with the picture and name of them perhaps in order of the champion name or you can choose with a pull down menu in which organization method you want them to be displayed in and also a counter somewhere that says exactly how many skins you own.

Do you guys agree, because let's face it RIOT's revenue is made up mostly from skin customers so I think they deserve this basic but convent and efficient method of being able to view what they own. 

WHY? well there is a list for the champions you own but there isn't a counter though so why not a list for skins? and a counter to let you know how many you got.

replies.body:
There is currently a "Collection" Tab on the Alpha Client. Right now it only has the old stuff like Champions/Runes etc but they could certainly add a "Skins" tab if they wanted to. I think the hard part would be how to present it.

http://imgur.com/a/bfi2q
I would love it if this came into the game, I've always wanted to know how many skins I own but going through each champion and tallying up is a lot of hassle.
